title: #10 - Planning Must Be Digitised
itunes:title: #10 - Planning Must Be Digitised
description: In this article I talk about why the planning system needs to undergo radical digitisation and suggest some policies that might help in that process. And please vote in the RIBA Elections!: www.architecture.com/elections
